title: Comparison of 2-hour versus 4-hour hemoadsorption combined with hemodialysis (HAHD): an in vitro and prospective clinical evaluation.
abstract: Although hemoadsorption combined with hemodialysis (HAHD) is increasingly used in patients undergoing maintenance hemodialysis (MHD), the optimal treatment duration remains uncertain. This study compared the efficacy and safety of 2-hour versus 4-hour HAHD sessions, supported by
